content: this chunky crochet sweater pattern is as fun to make as it is cozy to wear not to mention how easy it is super easy pattern includes a follow along video tutorial the sweater works up super fast with a #5 bulky yarn and an 8mm hook that means it a perfect sweater for gifts this holiday season it s also a perfect starter garment project for crochet beginners this pattern includes us women s sizes xs-xxl and is written in us english terms materials i used debbie bliss dulcie in color lilac #5 bulky weight yarn 8mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle 4 stitch markers skill easy notes this pattern is written in english us terminology this pattern made in us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl in this picture i have demonstrated with size small this sweater is worked flat in 4 separate pieces from the bottom up and then sewn together this pattern is in a multiples of 2 chain this pattern is a 2 row repeat row 2 and 3 yarn needed 830 880 940 990 1050 1100 yards gauge blocked 11 st x 10 5 row = 4 measurements after blocked xs = 17 81 body width across x 20 95 length s = 20 body width across x 20 95 length m = 22 18 body width across x 21 71 length l = 24 36 body width across x 21 71 length xl = 26 54 body width across x 22 47 length xxl = 28 72 body width across x 22 47 length thank you for stopping by happy crocheting
